channel.title: Error with the Server Status!
channel.description:
theres a problem with the server status, becuase when i go to register my server it comes up with "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'abdnscape.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '86.131.44.40'' at line 1"
How ever, it has worked in the past, and other people are able to register their server??
Can anyone help me? thnx

item.title: Error with the Server Status!

item.description:
@Mod_Billy wrote:

theres a problem with the server status, becuase when i go to register my server it comes up with “You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ’ IP= 'abdnscape.no-ip.biz' ORipfield` = ‘86.131.44.40’’ at line 1”

How ever, it has worked in the past, and other people are able to register their server??

Can anyone help me? thnx
